00432 #define EXP_OP_DEFAULT  0x30    
00439 #define EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x)      (((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_NONE) && \
00440                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LAST) && \
00441                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND_SEL) && \
00442                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASE) && \
00443                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEX) && \
00444                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEZ) && \
00445                                      !((SUPPL_IS_ROOT( x->suppl ) == 0) && \
00446                                        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SIG) || \
00447                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL) || \
00448                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL)) && \
00449                                        (SUPPL_OP( x->parent->expr->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND)) && \
00450                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DELAY)) ? 1 : 0)
00451 
00456 #define EXPR_COMB_MISSED(x)        (EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x) & (~SUPPL_WAS_TRUE(x->suppl) | ~SUPPL_WAS_FALSE(x->suppl)))
